specific_question: What was our average IT infrastructure upgrade cycle in Q3 2024?
answer: Average IT infrastructure upgrade cycle was 18 months with a 12% increase in upgrade frequency expected by 2025.
justification: IT infrastructure upgrade cycles do not address the core DR Question focus area on CRM solutions
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
